SSR.name: Stone Breaker
text: - __**450%**__ Damage (Damage Cap: **1,685,000**). **+30% Damage/+10% Damage Cap** against ***Blinded*** foe.
- Activate **Tallyho**. Will activate even if skill is on cooldown. Will not put skill on cooldown if it is available.
